Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.8.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.8.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-process-exporter is earlier than 0.8.2-1, affected by CVE-2022-21698
